name: Twister Jam
description:
Experimental multiplayer game, get as close as you can to tornadoes without getting killed by them. Play as the storm chasers or as the Tornado!

Team Green Discord:  https://discord.gg/cKwXvwAHUk

- The servers should be good to handle 20 concurrent users

- Each session lasts 90 seconds

- Use WSAD or the arrow keys to move around.
